name: @seznam/fastrpc
description: Implementation of FastRPC protocol by Seznam.cz

scripts.test: tsc --target es2018 --noEmit fastrpc.ts && cd ../test && node runner.mjs
scripts.build-mjs:linux: tsc --target es2018 fastrpc.ts && sed -i -e 's/TypeScript/ES2015 (autogenerated from TS source)/' fastrpc.js && mv fastrpc.js ../javascript/fastrpc.mjs
scripts.build-mjs:macos: tsc --target es2018 fastrpc.ts && sed -i '' -e 's/TypeScript/ES2015 (autogenerated from TS source)/' fastrpc.js && mv fastrpc.js ../javascript/fastrpc.mjs
